# $fmtNum

介绍

慕名而来

基础用法
$fmtNum(1000); //1,000

export function $fmtNum(num) {
  const str = num.toString();
  const reg =
    str.indexOf(".") > -1 ? /(\d)(?=(\d{3})+\.)/g : /(\d)(?=(?:\d{3})+$)/g;
  return str.replace(reg, "$1,");
}
查看源码
